website_summaries.verdict: A dual wireless controller charger that provides an easy way to charge your controllers.
pros: Includes 2 built-in micro-USB ports that can simultaneously charge your controllers while they are still being used
Will not charge a controller with over 70% power to protect the controller's battery
Compatible with PlayStation 4, PlayStation 4 Pro and PlayStation 4 Slim controllers
cons: Controllers can be difficult to set into the charger

website_summaries.verdict: A stylish charging station with a small footprint.
pros: This affordable charging station boasts a 30-minute charge time and includes a USB cable, allowing you to plug the station directly into your PS4 or into a wall USB charger if you have one
Customers love the look of this station and the charging indicator lights
cons: You'll have to keep your PS4 on or in rest mode if you don't have a wall USB charger
May be difficult to plug controllers in

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for great product.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so here's what i thought after an hour using them. Value: 9/10 you pretty much get what you pay for. Nothing too insane here Build Quality: 10/10 as i said in the video, the charger feel pretty solid to me and weight like 1/2 of my PS4 controller. The look: 9/10 okay look, i prefer it all black but not a big deal tho. Function: 10/10 Charging as fast as the PS4, nothing too special here. I personally like to plug it in the PS4 since it just work the same for me. I would rate this product an overall as 9.5/10. Would buy this again if i have another pair of PS4 controller.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffey Molt

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little charger. The clear plastic holders help guide the controller easily into the charger plug. It is vertical, so the footprint is small, which is great for small side tables. The usb cord is comes with is a a nice length. The lights are nice so that you know it is charging. It is plastic, but everything is, so that isn't a knock. Just a solid design.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The lights never turn off and are too bright
customer_reviews.text: The blue lights do not turn off! Ever! The charger seems to work fine, but the blue lights are BRIGHT and there's no way to turn them off. They don't turn off when the controllers are fully charged. They don't turn off when there are no controllers docked. If the charger is plugged in, they are on, they are bright, and they are visually distracting. I bought a new charger. I couldn't stand the brightness of the lights all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Great Dualshock 4 Charging Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product (quite smaller than I expected) but when I saw the cool blue and red LED lights I knew I had to have it. On a practical note, the base is quite sturdy, as well as the way the stand holds two controllers. In a two player household I was looking for a way to charge two controllers or at least use one with a second controller charged and ready. The charger comes with a mini USB cable and I have that plugged into an old USB wall charger that I had laying around. Overall this is a great looking charging stand, for which you can't beat the price. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PeterW

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger. Sleek, Black, Glossy, Yum.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars. Sleek. I have it parked on the PS4 as motivation for people to actually charge it. Hey.. It worked. Had it 6 months now and still looks great and working. I bought another as a gift for one of my buddies who's kid never charged his controllers. Worked great for them as well. I love doing reviews for all types of products. Yes I paid full price for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I got this as a Christmas gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I got this as a Christmas gift for my Bf and the both of us are super happy! Fast charge. You know as soon as the controller is at 100% when the light changes blue. Will buy again for my system.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: and poor design. Controllers do not set in charger well ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, and poor design. Controllers do not set in charger well and slightest touch will disconnect. No A/C adapter supplied, only a short cheap USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Stylish &
customer_reviews.text: This charger is perfect for eliminating wires, takes up small amount of space, easy to set up and use and it looks great next to the PS4. The best part is the set up. It's virtually 'plug and play' and the station holds the controllers snuggly while charging and when not in use. The controller charging lights on the station let you know when charging is occuring and when the controller is ready. I like the way it looks - very stylish and 'tekky' and fits perfectly in a corner near the PS4. I works great, looks great and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Savage

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of my controls not having a home or getting shoved in a drawer. I wanted a clean and economical solution to charging them. This stand was inexpensive but looks and feels like more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: ECavinder

customer_reviews.title: Niccee
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to my PS4 setup. Initially I was hesitant about how the controllers would fit but after using a few weeks I have to admit taking the controller on and off this dock is fairly easy. Do not connect this to your system and try to charge both controllers at once. I put a cellphone brick on the end of this and plug it straight into an outlet. Overall this a good product.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. The charger seems to work well. My only complaint is that is is a bit difficult to align the male part of the charger with the female port on the controller...but does not appear to be a poor design, rather just part of this sort of setup. I worry the difficulty will lead to the male part eventually breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging my controller after a month
customer_reviews.text: This charger was great for about a month. Then one of my controllers stopped charging. At first I thought it was the controller, but when I plugged it into a USB cord the controller charged like it should. Unfortunately this started happening two days after the return window closed so now I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Redden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice charger, works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It is really 4.5 stars because I don't entirely like the lightning on the little transparent plastic pieces that I'm not sure if they attempted to use as light guides, but of they did, is poorly implemented. But other than that it is a very good product and of you don't mind the lights detail I definitely recommend it. As far as what is supposed to do, charging, or works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel M.

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT, QUICK, LIGHTWEIGHT, PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be kind of bulky and cumbersome but it is actually quite compact and fits well next to my PS4. I never needed one before and am grateful that the first time I ordered one it was of the best quality. It charges my controllers quickly and is more efficient than having to keep my PS4 in rest mode to charge them up. I appreciate the very prompt and quick delivery of the product, along with the very strong packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This thing broke my controllers
customer_reviews.text: I had thought that maybe it was just their age, considering they're over three years old. However, after using this dock for a few days, both controllers just quit holding a charge. I experimented with different cords, adapters, and outlets rather than relying on the dock to see if they would power on and nothing happened. I purchased a new controller and put it on the dock. The dock never lit red, but the controller was getting power, and I pulled the controller off after 2 hours only to see that it was dead. Don't get this if you want to keep your controllers functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We have kids, dogs, and cats that seem to love aggressively unplugging our controllers from the regular charging chord. Because of this both our PS4 controllers no longer charged, we were concerned the actual controllers were broken so before we sailed off to purchase two new ones my husband purchased this to eliminate the variable that it was the chord. SO thankful he did this because this set up charges both controllers! Even better, we don't have to worry about kids and animals chewing/running into/whipping the chord because there is none. We should've bought this sooner since it is so handy and gives us peace of mind that we don't have to worry about purchasing new controllers.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It works, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Controllers feel a little loose in the holders, but they do stay in. The bottom port seems to have the most problems with this and won't charge if it is too loose. One of our controllers fits better than the other so I usually have to make sure that it is on the bottom. With this setup, they charge completely and fairly quickly. Haven't had any problems with controller batteries running down in the middle of playing since. Also, I plugged the USB cord into a wall outlet adapter so it can charge even without the PS4. With two kids playing together it's nice to be able to charge both controllers together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great device, if it worked for longer than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on January 29, 2019. I got it quickly. It connects with a USB cable, which is NOT included with the charger. The actual charger was great - when it worked. As of the last week, it no longer charges. I've changed out the USB, the plug, etc., in case it was that, and not the actual device, but, no. Nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: C'na

customer_reviews.title: Kid Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my controllers. I have 5. I have 6 boys from 6yo up to 17yo. All of them had issues with the dongle type chargers as they kept breaking the dongles. The teens kept taking the charge cords for their other devices and not replacing them. These chargers work great and self guide the controller into position. It even prevents you from "breaking" the connection on the controller because of how it holds the controller on the stand. I highly recommend these! Only issue is teaching your children to put the controllers on the stand after each use!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sieler

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Great design great style, only real complaint is that it needs to be heavier!! It holds the controllers so well that when their removed the entire charger will go with controllers!! LOL When actually charging I see a red/blue glow coming from the port that's working, while full and standby is a solid blue glow. Also i noticed some faint marking on the "touchpad" like from a rubbing when taking in or out. Hold's tight enough I left a game (Gran Turismo Sport) running WITH vibration OVERNIGHT and charger was still holding and keeping charged no problem.
customer_reviews.author: A&J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Charging block isnt included, couldnt use it until I made another purchase
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as supposed to however when you order a charger you expect it to come with an actual plug so that it can be used to CHARGE the devices you are buying it for. I had to go and buy another charging block to plug the cord I to so that it could be used. I wouldnt have bought this one if I had known or saw it stated in the listed that the block/plug wasnt included
customer_reviews.author: QueenFeen

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Charger
customer_reviews.text: Nice charger for my PS4 older model gamepad. Had ordered other gamepad chargers but the docking ports were for the newer controllers. For the price it works good and once you figure out how to dock your controllers, it’s pretty simple. The charger doesn’t need much room but it does take two hands to remove and install the game pads. I have mine plugged in to the PlayStation USB port, so it’s only charging when the PlayStation is being used. That works good for me. Don’t need anymore light at night when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Well, it lasted 6 months. In month 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it lasted 6 months. In month 7 one of the metal heads on this glorified micro-USB splitter ripped off. Average use. No misuse. A bit disappointing. It's not a contact charger. You still have to plug the micro-USB heads on the charger into the PS4 controllers. It's just harder to use than cords, especially in the dark. No real benefit to the tower - it takes up as much space as 2 controllers next to each other. My next solution is going to be a simple 4-port powered hub and 4 short cords. Update - two stars added for integrity and customer service. Seller stood by their product. Would try again.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy, take it out of the box and connect. Two things I've noticed after having it a bit is... if you don't get the right angle to replace the remote, it can take a couple of seconds to get back in to charge. Secondly, the charger leaves a permanent mark where it rubs the controller as it's being placed in the charger. I like the indicator light helps see which remote is fully charged (blue for charged, red for charging). Keeps the charge well enough for me and can easily be placed anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent! I have 2 white and 2 black controllers for my 2 PS4's. We online game every chance we get, so while we are using one controller, the other one is charging. Never have to worry about making sure a controller is charged before a long weekend of gaming. Shows red while charging and blue when charged. Hooks to your PS4 via USB cable that is about 3 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: rkybronc

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I would give ten stars if possible. It got here quick, looks sleek, charges both controllers pretty quick, and it's so easy to assemble my 9 year old daughter could put it together without using the instructions. I guarantee it's just as good as the charging stands that cost twice as much. If not, better. Another plus is within 2-3 days of delivery the seller reached out to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase and that everything was good. You don't see that much anymore these days. If you're undecided then you should go ahead and decide and just buy it. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best for Spare Controllers
customer_reviews.text: Not a rapid charger but with two docks you can switch out if needed. Indicator lights look good and work well. Had issues getting controllers on and off dock and the track pads were scratched. I used a Dremel to cut off the overhang to prevent further damage. Would not advise using with special edition controllers if unwilling to mod dock or risk damage to controllers. Otherwise it's reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leaora

customer_reviews.title: it works fine plugged into the USB port of the PS4
customer_reviews.text: The charger works exactly as described. Charges two PS4 controllers fairly quickly. It has a sleek design and is smaller than I had expected, which I felt was a positive. The only critical comment I have is it does not also come with an adaptor to plug directly into a power outlet; it works fine plugged into the USB port of the PS4, and who doesn't have a couple extra USB-to-AC outlet adaptor lying around? However, it would have been much more convenient if one was included. Otherwise, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: gorgonzola

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Buy This one. Buy this one. Seriously. Im a real consumer and purchased this charging port. Best one Ive owned so far. This is my 3rd one. Not the same as other 2 Ive originally owned. This is probably the best so far. No issues yet.. STill charging. All lights are still functioning unlike my others. Great for price. In fact, i'll just go out on the limb and say this.. YOU WONT BEAT THIS PRICE..LOL Great Product! Thanks Friends. Oh b4 I forget.. #GoPS4Gamers #GameOn #LOL
customer_reviews.author: D Chandler

customer_reviews.title: It's worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I love this charging station. What's great about it is that you can recharge two controllers at once and have them in a convenient location for you to keep them. None of that willy-nilly leaving them around nonsense. I looks great and keeps my controllers charged for my next gaming session. I would recommend them to everyone who owns a Playstation.
customer_reviews.author: BeerAndPancakes

customer_reviews.title: description of product is OFF !!
customer_reviews.text: When you place your remotes in to charge or just store, it tips over. The way it is made ..bottom part is not long enough I guess..it just falls over..another one bites the dust. I wish I could learn from all this junk I have ordered and d end up donating or tossing it. SAD !
customer_reviews.author: K/S

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: I have two teenage boys and they are not gentle on anything. I've used the PS4 brand wireless charger for years. The little plastic feet always break. Then you are performing a balancing act of trying to keep the charger upright and the controllers attached. This one works great. It's easy to get the controllers on and off and there is a red light to show you when it's charging. Best part: the big plastic base seems to be teenage boy-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do. It charges ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. It charges 2 controllers at the same time. I see no need for such bright LED's though. Very distracting when you want a dark room. I guess I'll have to break out some electrical tape and cover them up.
customer_reviews.author: Sirus

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should, it's smaller than expected as other people said (even with the knowledge that it was small, I was still like, dang that's small). They're a base hidden in the packaging that I didn't notice at first, you might even throw it away. Don't, the unit isn't secure without it, so look out for it in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Colton C.

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is good! The plastic is more flimsy than I thought it would be, so I took one star off for that. I'm not sure how it would last in a household with children, but I don't have kids so its good for me. Its holds 2 controllers nicely and supports them. Its very east to assemble and very easy to use. So far so good. I will update this review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alana P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because of the price, but this thing is excellent. I have two PS4 controllers, both with skin coverings and stick pad enhancements, and they fit perfectly into the charging station. Each slot has red and blue back lighting - red for charging in progress, blue for fully charged. It looks very sleek and cool. I have my charger connected to a standard AC power strip using a USB charging adapter, but you could just connect it to the USB port on the PS4 console. Highly recommend this, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe19

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We have had issue keeping our 4 controllers charged either by plugging them directly into the ps4 or on another charging station that we had bought previously. We found the old one unreliable so decided to try this one. So far we have had it for a week and it works as intended. We have no issues at all with keeping our controllers charged. We even bought a second charging station because it worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Mia M Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to PS4 set-up
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 starts not 5 is because of no wall outlet adapter (and yes, i knew this before buying it). Otherwise, classy look and as long as you are gentle, not rough, item should last the lifetime of the PS4. Looks great in black, but there is a white one offered. Cannot find this brand anywhere else on the internet, so just read thru the reviews on here to judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy the Marine

customer_reviews.title: Left much to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: ***Edit/update: 2 weeks into ownership and the fact is, it doesn't fully charge the remotes. The top port only charged to 2/3 and the bottom to 1/3. I had to return it. *** This is great. I don't know why it took me this long to buy something like this. It was exactly what I was looking for and performs the way it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: John M F

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: i love the blue light while chargin the controller. its a great addition to a night light. However, the controllers do not stay snug in the charging holders. Ive pushed the controllers all the way in the holders, but they seem to fit loosely. this charger is set on top of the tv stand so the kids can easily remove the controllers and put back in the charger on their own. It did not come with the wall plug in socket for the cable charger but it did come with the cable charger. Overall, great concept and affordable price for extra night light feature.
customer_reviews.author: fe

customer_reviews.title: Already broke, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this item two months ago and the bottom charger is no longer working. I have not dropped it or damaged it in any way, it just sits on a table and holds my PS4 controllers. The controllers do still plug into the mini usb but no light comes on, even though the controller needs to charge. No blue light showing full charge either. Good thing the PS4 comes with its own cable so I can still charge both controllers simultaneously. Don’t bother with this product, it’ll crap out on you.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Ballew

customer_reviews.title: Bright addition to your gaming set up
customer_reviews.text: The charge itself is consistent, however it is not without issue. The largest of which is the fact that the lights NEVER shut off. Additionally, contrary to the manual, they do not change color to indicate charge. They are blue and only indicate that the charge station is plugged in. It also requires two hands to be able to pull a controller from the station.
customer_reviews.author: joseph Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Was a cheap fix for the moment.
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical due to the amount of money that was asked for the product. Depleted both ps4 controllers completely and charged them simultaneously. Fully charged in about 15 minutes. At this time, I am pleased... UPDATE; after 1 year... It has failed miserably. The mini USB ports on the unit have broken off. A short in the base developed about the 8th month. Would not charge the controllers any longer... It is now in a landfill somewhere. R.I.P. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: It worked until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for three months and my son managed to break it. When trying to plug in the USB cable in the back, he managed to push in the port. It's completely unusable. The piece fell inside the charger. When you shook it, it rattled. It went in the trash. Glad I didn't pay a lot. I should have tried contacting the seller first but too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger has been great! I have owned this item for over 7 months as of this review and I have had absolutely zero issues. I have recommended this item to several others and they have all enjoyed it as much as I have. Hot only does it work great, but it also looks great and is easy to use too. I highly recommend it, and would 100% purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: ITtype

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This charger works well with my PS4. It was easy to plug in, and doesn't take up much room. I really like the design because it keeps the controllers in one place, and keeps my TV stand less cluttered. The duel charge is great for keeping both of my controllers charged at once. There is a red light that turns on when its charging, and then it turns blue when its charged. Its sleek, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Abert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch to my entertainment system.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as expected and functions correctly. Love the look and design; it gave my entertainment system a very nice touch in aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Bao-ngoc

customer_reviews.title: Does Almost Everything Right
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, charges properly and quickly, takes up very little space. The biggest problem is that when the PS4 is in rest mode, it will NOT charge the controllers through this device. Crazy annoying, but not this company's fault. PS4 won't even charge it's own damn headphones made specifically for the console if it's in rest mode. Worth knowing either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Optimal quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you're an avid amazon shopper, then you're probably like me and you're probably skeptical of lesser known brands.That being said, I'm very happy to say that this product WORKS and makes gaming life so much easier! It's been reliable for about half a year now and works just as promised. This is a must have for any ps4 gamer 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Auxy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. You can charge your controllers quickly and it organizes them nicely with a neat back light to tell you when the thing is fully charged again. It even will hold the controllers without charging the remote if you don't want it to. Only downside is that I feel like I need to be gentle with the thing. The plastic "shelves" that hold the controllers don't feel real sturdy. Overall happy I purchased and surprised that it works so well for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: nitehawk49

customer_reviews.title: Fits the slim PS4 Controllers like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters about 3-4 weeks ago. Seems very lite weight, but had no issues installing both controllers(PS4). Nice to charge both at the same time vs using a single cord for one. Controller fit like a glove and have no issues yet. It does what it suppose to do. I'll write a update review in 6 monthes. March 3rd and still no issues with charger. Definitely still getting my money's worth😄
customer_reviews.author: john lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for PS4 controllers
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck, I was going for a high end controller charger but a friend referred me to this product. I have used it for few months now and I am very happy with it. It is very easy to setup and love the colors. I am giving it 5 stars, why waste a lot of money when this product can what the expensive ones can for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Babayo

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my controllers and they work great. The indicator lights allow you to know when it’s charging and when it’s finished. The lights are not an issue for me I know some people were complaining of the glow at night, but for me it’s not in my bedroom so it creates a nice glow in my game room.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good controller, short cable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer but recently retired so decided to do stuff I hadn't had time for before. This controller charger works well, but you'll have to either place it near your game or get a USB extension cable (which I did) for it. My console is down in my TV credenza, and i wanted this up on top. Mini USB cable (didn't know anyone even made anything with those anymore) was too short. Once I put an extender on it, it worked fine. Looks very good sitting there in the dark. Would buy again, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Controller fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to charge multiple controllers at the same time. At 60.00 a piece for the controller itself, I read all the reviews and felt comfortable before I bought it. Easy at a glance view of charge status. Red- not done, blue, good to go. Can be seen clearly from the sitting position and I don’t have to get up and check. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: linslanding

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so well, had to get the PS3 version too
customer_reviews.text: My Sony PS4 controllers, one original, one the revision model, fit nice and snug in the tower. It charges perfectly fine, and I do not find the lights distracting--although they are on a shelf above the 65" LED TV (LG). I liked it so much I bought the same design for the PS3 controllers as wel.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Haliwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So glad I bought this. We play all the time but it was getting really annoying bring hooked to the console every time the battery got low. This is easy to use, keeps the controllers out of the way and organized, charges quickly and looks good. The light tells you if it's charged or not to which is also nice. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel M.

customer_reviews.title: Blue LEDs you're good to go - Red means it's charging ;)
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and colorful charge indicators add to the great value of this PS4 DualShock Controller recharging station. Uses a micro USB port to supply the station; I use a spare port from my TV. The controller fits snugly into one of the 2 docks on the station - may take a couple tries to line it up at first but I've gotten used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After having repeating issues with cables breaking and failing and not charging my controllers, we have decided to try one of these. We didn't know which one to get, so we went with the cheapest we could find. Looking a bit flimsy at first, it is very easy to use, worth the money, and I am never looking back.
customer_reviews.author: Yakir G.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger and communication
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is as described. It took a bit of time to get comfortable with how the controllers connect to the charger but after a few times it's easy to get the hang of it. We love the ease and compact nature of the charger. It sits on a shelf next to the ps4 and so there is just one wire to keep connected so it cleans up our previous system of having the controllers directly connected to the ps4. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good product at great price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged, and in perfect condition. Was very easy to assemble, didn't even need the instructions. The unit is plastic, but feels very sturdy and not flimsy like similar models I have looked at. Controllers fit snugly in their holders, and the lights work well; red when charging, blue when charged. Takes about a couple hours to charge from flat to full, Overall, very impressed with the product, no complaints, and will be sure to check out the vendor if I need other PS4 accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It’s works without any problems
customer_reviews.text: my wire cable wasn’t changing or kept popping out of the controller while playing with the slight movement so I need a new changer and this works perfectly it keeps long changeand I just have to sick my controllers on when I done with them. If I had to give draw back it would be the cool light it gives off while charging can be a bit annoying at times (it is bright, well for someone like me who like to sleep in the dark but then again it makes pretty good night light I guess.)
customer_reviews.author: Nanashi

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Mine arrived with only one charger working.
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Tried using it the first time and the top port drains my controller batteries. the bottom port charges though. A few times now I put a controller in the top port to find the controller dead no matter how many hours it is on the charger. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The charging station is compact, stylish, and easy to use. When it arrives in the box, there are only two steps in the installation process: snapping the base to the stem and plugging it up. Ensure it is aligned or else it will not snap into place. Then, plug it up to an electrical source, whether it is the outlet with an adapter or directly to the PS4. I plug mine directly into the PS4 and let it charge my controllers. I love how it doesn't overcharge them and it looks cool with the blue light. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger for PS4 controllers
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, it was easy to put together and hook up to PS4. Charges awesomely! Yes it sucks you can’t really play the controller while it’s charging, I mean you can use it while charging but it’s kinda bulky and makes playing games a bit difficult. All in all, I’d purchase this item again it does what it’s suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!! Easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The tower/charger looks great when lit up with the remotes charging. The remotes actually slide into the charging port super easy with has been a problem for me with other chargers, not this one!! It is well made and it is very sturdy which I need with my two little ones being rough on anything and everything. I suggest you buy this item. You will be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Worked for awhile, then broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for a month or two, then after a bit of normal wear and tear it stopped charging on one of the stands. Shortly after, the other charger stopped working as well. I believe that the actual metal connections are poorly made, resulting in bad connection and no charging ability. Would get a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bro's birthday and he is a huge fan of it. his charging cables kept getting broken before and now that he has this device he no longer has to worry about that anymore. He has 2 controllers and now he never has to have the room looking cluttered with cables all over the place to get them charged.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up. Little kids can plug in and remove without issue. It’s worth the price to keep from having to plug them in separately. The blue light while charging can be kind of bright. I’ve had to unplug it at night when I’ve retreated to the sofa to escape clingy kids in my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have this dock connected to my PS4 and placed on top of it. I always have 2 charged controllers as backup because of this nifty docking station. When you insert the controller the light changes to show its charging. I have had this device for month without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amart

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in mid March and it worked fine, now all of a sudden it stopped working. I know it’s the device because when I direct connect the cord from my PlayStation to my controller, it still charges. Just frustrating as I take very good care of my items and I’ve had it less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mmarie

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend's PlayStation charger cords always seemed to go bad on him to where he'd have to position it ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend's PlayStation charger cords always seemed to go bad on him to where he'd have to position it just right to get them to work. I paid just a few bucks for this gem and it's entirely convenient and saves so much hassle. We should have gotten one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Annoying double blue light always on.
customer_reviews.text: While it may do an acceptable job charging the controllers, they should provide a way to turn off the light when it isn't charging. If you keep your TV viewing area on the dark side as I do, it's way annoying. Will be getting creative with some electrical tape to see if I can at least tone it down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: While this does neatly store 2 controllers, I didn't find the quality matched the reviews. The charger was bent and I had to use the original playstation cord since the broken one didn't work. Putting it together was intuitive, but not easy if you have any arthritis. In fact, the quality of plastic was so cheap, it broke putting it together. Rather than hassel and send it back we glued it and charged up the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Giard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice. Overall I would say I'm satisfied. The only issue I have with it is that the controllers don't feel very stable while docked; there's just a little bit of 'droop' that I'm afraid might impact the power connection after a long period of use. This is the reason for 4/5 instead of 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and one of the LEDs kept blinking when it shouldn’t have. Lights not lighting up when they should... Weird. Returned and replaced within 24 hours. This one is perfect! Both light up blue when fully charged, no blinking and only one light turns red when only one is being charged. Great value, actually works and awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use, charges 2 controllers at the same time, small and easy to set up. Cons: You have to buy a separate usb to wall outlet if you don't want to use PS4 to charge. Great device that quickly charges 2 controllers without issue. LED lights are blue when done and red when charging, very straight forward. I bought an USB to Wall hook up so I do not have to leave the PS4 on to charge, nor take up a USB slot on PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Tinsera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves 0 stars. I bought it on June 23 my son was so excited to get it for his birthday at fist it was working fine but yesterday he comes and tells me that it broke I went to go see it and the charging piece to it had broke off when he pulled the controller of the charger to used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: two controlers play one while charge the other
customer_reviews.text: thats the reason I bought this to play one controller while the other is chargeing. its working good so far I haven't had it long enough to know if there is a problem with battery memory so, but other than it's a five star deal
customer_reviews.author: Zeality

customer_reviews.title: Quits working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was tinplug the controllers in and how nice it looked. It charged the controllers perfectly. Now, a little over a month later it no longer charges the controllers. Very disappointed and will be looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Dtkirch

customer_reviews.title: A great option for the living room.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Solid built, arrive on time with no problem and looks amazing. Only thing is that I recommend it for the living not the bedroom. The things is, the led light doesn't turn off except if you disconnect the usb cable (and the controller wont charge then) and the light is bright enough that it could be a problem if you are close to it and trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: I went with the recommended route of plugging in to a wall outlet
customer_reviews.text: It's working well to charge our PS4 controllers. I went with the recommended route of plugging in to a wall outlet. The controllers don't fit super tight, but they aren't falling out or anything and are charging. Happy overall with this purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Teves

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and it did a great job charging and kept cord mess down. However after a few months the bottom stopped charging, I didn't take away any stars because I'm not sure if it was the actual device or the kids. Either way it's still a good price for a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Dina H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great too
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great too! If you want to use a longer cable with it, make sure to get a USB mini and not a USB micro, though. Also, the move controllers do not fit on this, so you may wish to find another product if you use those extensively.
customer_reviews.author: AreYouSeriously

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid product at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Zero complaints with the product. It dies exactly what is advertised. It dies require a/c power via USB. I usually leave mine connected to my PS4 and switch controllers as I use them if playing by myself. Other times, I'll plug it in via Anker high-speed USB charging port and that works well too. This is a solid product at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve had it for several months now and it functions perfectly. Looks sleek out in the open, and I even get comments on it now and again by people stopping by. Sturdy for holding two controllers at once. The only point that I don’t care for is when I’m returning a controller to its charging position, I have it angle it just right to return it to its cradle. A minor inconvience compared to any other charging alternative! Would happily buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Zexion101

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I had the hardest time managing to keep my controllers charged as I use them mostly for viewing PS Vue. What a nice upgrade it has been to be able to use this dock. It looks less cluttered and looks much better than having controllers laying everywhere. I would recommend this product. I bought a second one for a friend after using mine for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Hereforthewants

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast, better for your controller
customer_reviews.text: I was having a problem with my controller never charging. I realized it was because the controller was pressing the wire down into whatever surface I set it on. This charging station definitely fixed that. It charges super fast and stays charged for a couple days (it would stay charged longer if my controller wasn’t dropped so often 😬). My Only issue is that the bottom port is already loose! When I take the controller out, it comes out a couple centimeters. I’ve just started using the top port instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: One month in...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly one month since I ordered this charger and it stopped working. Uses a micro-USB cord - from the base to a charger. That cord is why I don't charge straight from the PS4, because they constantly bend and ruin the port. And that's what happened with this charger. Wouldn't recommend - at all.
customer_reviews.author: Slovak34

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, super easy to use and only changes until the control is at 100% the only downside is that no matter what the blue lights stay on, so it can be a bother when you like to sleep in a darkness that's blacker than your soul
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool because even if we are not playing two player and need both controls chargers it still has its uses.. For example i love it when on controller is dying and i can swap out placing the dying one on charger and having a brand new charger controller. It is easy to use and in my opinion looks really nice! Glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Helen Golod

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and saves space
customer_reviews.text: We were constantly getting the low battery error on our two controllers because we could only charge one at a time and would often forget to plug them in. This handy tower can charge both at once in the same amount of shelf space and are a great visual reminder to do so. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way that matters.
customer_reviews.text: This product is simple and easy to use, there was no hassle whatsoever setting it up or using it. The only issue I have is that I wasn’t able to hook up my primary controller to it, I have a SCUFF controller with added paddles to the underside of the controller. The added thickness to the controller with the paddles makes it impossible to hook up such controllers to the usb “dock”. But it’s ultimately not a problem with the product itself. It would be nice if the designers and manufacturers made an adjustable “dock to include controllers like mine that many gamers use. Otherwise it’s been perfect and have had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old one!
customer_reviews.text: Had a charging port that stood high and had connectors you had to use to charge it (was bought in a PS4 bundle). Constantly fell over with the slightest bump. This one sits lower and there are no additional components to mess with. Charges quickly and is easy to see when it is done charging. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Too bright
customer_reviews.text: Great product but man it is bright. I ended up taking mine apart and spray painting the clear plastic and LEDs black. Would have like to been able to turn the lights on and off as I wanted. But other than the lights it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: A gamer MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: All the boys in my house have one of these towers now. Super easy to set up (my 8yo put his together) Charges quickly and charges two controllers at a time. I like that there are less wires bc of this tower too. A must have if you have gamers in your house!
customer_reviews.author: jjcote222

customer_reviews.title: Better than the spring chargers
customer_reviews.text: The last charger we had was far easier to place the controller in but it was easy to place it incorrectly and not have it charge at all. While this one takes a little more work to place it correctly, the pleasing lights let you know when it's not charging properly.
customer_reviews.author: dezsantos

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: It works WAY better and feels WAY better and more secure than the official playstation dock charger. My dock station from Playstation broke after awhile. This one is still going strong and I prefer it. Its also cheaper than the official PS4 one.
customer_reviews.author: Edy

customer_reviews.title: Charges and keeps my controlers together. Plastic shelves may be a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, was easy to put together. Charges both my controlers, i worry about the plastic shelves and feel like they may break pretty easy but they have held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Works great. Looks nice. I bought the 2 or 3 yr warranty (the lowest one) just to be safe because I have never used the product before. At this rate I don't think I'll need it. But it was only like 2 bucks. Overall it works great and I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Timothy wiles

product_meta.title: PS4 Controller Charger, Y Team Playstation 4 / PS4 / PS4 Pro / PS4 Slim Controller Charger Charging Docking Station Stand.Dual USB Fast Charging Station & LED Indicator for Sony PS4 Controller--Black
product_meta.description: Features dual wireless Controller charger for PS4/PS4 Slim/PS4 Pro Controller with the charging dock, users will be able to charge up to two dual-shock 4 wireless Controllers at once without having to connect them to the PS4 system with 2 built-in micro USB adaptor ports the charge dock can simultaneously charge connecting the cable will allow charging while the Controller still being used will not charge the Controller with over 70% power to protect the battery of the Controller the charge dock plugs directly into the Wall, leaving the USB ports on the for Sony's PS4 open and the Console tangle free for Sony PS4 USB charger station provides an easy and quick way to charge and store your for PS4 Controllers specifications LED indicator: red - charging LED indicator: blue - fully charged built-in protector chip: never over charged your PS4 Controller even charge it for overnight fully charge time: about 30 minutes input voltage: DC 5V 1000mA output voltage: DC 500mA for each Controller charge slot cable length: about 3.3Ft(1 meters) package included: 1 x Controller charging station 1 x USB cable note: the PS4 Controllers in the pictures are not included in the package.
feature_bullets: Sleek and Compact--This dual PS4 controller charger provides an easy and quick way to charge and store your PS4 / PS4 Pro / PS4 Slim Controller. Ideal for saving your place to store your PS4 wireless controllers in the charger when you're not playing

Safe and Fast Charge--With 2 built-in micro USB adapter ports, allows you to securely store and charge up 2 PS4 controllers simultaneously. One controller just need 2 hours. 4 hours for two controllers
LED Charge indicator--USB cable connects the power the PS4 Charger Stand turns to blue color, plug in the controller turns to red color, charged fully turns to blue color again

Excellent Chip Design--Built-in protector chip, you never worry about Over-Charging/Over-Heated/Over-Current/Over-Voltage/Short-Circuit/Over-Discharger. How to provide you with safe and durable Ps4 charger is our eternal pursuit
Support--If you have any problems about Y Team product. Please feel free to contact us, we will provide satisfied solution

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,321 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
